name: How to get a job in the zoo
name_original: How to get a job in the zoo
description:
Game Blog

This is a text adventure game about "unreliable narrator". The game tells the interesting story of a man named Wilson who is applying for a job at the zoo with another man named Ryan. The game is very mini, only 15-30 minutes to experience all the plot, very suitable for fun in the boring free time!

Since the game is actually a school assignment, we only had a very limited amount of time to design and develop it, so please click on the link to the game blog for the design process and detailed settings.

If you're interested in this fun little game, feel free to download and play it! Thank you for watching :)

Design&Code:Tianyu Xiang (MesonD2O)

Character Design:Jiamin Wu

Artworks Design: Zhiya Chen & Jinyun Liu
